title: Contract Controversy
description:
Mina Kimes and Frank Isola discuss if the Cardinals' issue is done after they removed Kyler’s “independent study” clause following public outrage, if DK’s new extension is a good deal for both sides and if its fair for there to be a weight clause in Zion’s new contract with the Pelicans. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Kyler's "independent study" gets scrapped from his contract and is DK's new extension a good deal for both sides?
